meanings.definition: Expressing the relationship between a part and a whole.
meanings.sent1: The handle of the cup is made of plastic.
meanings.sent2: She ate a piece of cake for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over a tower of cans.
meanings.sent4: His heart was full of joy.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room.

meanings.definition: Expressing the relationship between a general category and the thing being specified.
meanings.sent1: She is a student of history.
meanings.sent2: I bought a book of poems.
meanings.sent3: The garden was full of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent4: His words were full of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The room was full of the smell of fresh bread.

meanings.definition: Expressing the relationship between a point of reckoning and a time or event.
meanings.sent1: The meeting is scheduled for 3 o'clock.
meanings.sent2: They left for the airport at the break of dawn.
meanings.sent3: The party lasted until the stroke of midnight.
meanings.sent4: The announcement came at the end of the show.
meanings.sent5: The train departed at the crack of dawn.
